message:
I used this website: http://iPhoneUnlockWizard.com and i managed to unlock and jailbreak my iPhone quite fast! I got some other free stuff! you can try it too if you want!

take care,
Oh look! Another spammer. I'll tell. :) /cc @ericflo

The Convore team (@ericflo et al.) will correct me if I'm wrong (I hope) but making the site invite-only would be contrary to the sense of community they're trying to foster. As far as spam posts are concerned, they've undoubtedly been considering this and have an outline for a plan of attack.
we should make convore a by invite only community to reduce the spam
Agreed! Community and content is more important than trying to marginally cut down on spam. It's going to be everywhere. Let the community police itself.
